name: Scrapnetic
description:
Try to collect as much scrap as possible while not getting destroyed by enemies.

Use your magnet to collide the enemies with asteroids, try to not get hit while doing that!

Controls are on the game

Made by:

Karma Future Font by Raymond Larabie
